title: Pre-race UCI Ban on Prototype Ekoi Pedals Leaves Riders Floundering for New Shoes
content:
The UCI put a stop to the use of massive Ekoi prototype pedals less than an hour before the start of Stage 2 of the Étoile de Bessèges

Read the full article at Pre-race UCI Ban on Prototype Ekoi Pedals Leaves Riders Floundering for New Shoes on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
